text: Belén Esteban Menéndez is a Spanish television personality. She presents the television show Sálvame with Jorge Javier Vazquez.Jésus Rodríguez (2011-01-10), The very public life of Belén Esteban, El País (English edition) ==References== Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish entertainers
title: Belén Esteban
